page.title: 15Youth for Christ, Swindon
page.content: {Thamesdown YFC}has been operating in Swindon for 30 years. The aim is to tell young people about God and Jesus, and act as a bridge between young people and the Church. At a SKYLINE meeting young Christians and their friends meet for concerts, films, special events,and for opportunity to learn about the Faith. There is also a sports evening. On one saturday a month there is an event held in the town-centre with music and drama to tell others about new life in Jesus.There is also gardening for the elderly and handicapped, a programme on Hospital radio, and a Christian Youth news-service for Wiltshire radio. A double-decker bus is being equipped to tour villages and schools. There is no formal membership, anyone can join in.
